turkish_example_sentence: Biz o pahalı tatili yapmayacaktık ama piyangoda para kazandık.
english_example_sentence: We were not going to make that expensive vacation but we won money in the lottery.
russian_example_sentence: Мы не собирались делать тот дорогой отпуск, но мы выиграли деньги в лотерее.
